alert.note: Alert for Benson; Cavalier; Eddy; Ramsey; Towner (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 17 at 2:14PM CST until January 18 at 9:00PM CST by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 9 AM TO 9 PM CST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Near blizzard conditions in open country at times. Winds gusting as high as 55 mph. * WHERE...Towner, Cavalier, Benson, Ramsey and Eddy Counties. * WHEN...From 9 AM to 9 PM CST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Widespread blowing snow will significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute. Cold wind chills as low as 30 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...There is a 30 percent chance for widespread and consistent blizzard conditions in open country. This will happen if snow showers develop behind the cold front.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for North Dakota can be found at dot.nd.gov/travel and for Minnesota at 511mn.org, or by calling 5 1 1 in either state.
